title: ✔️ Important Update: Certificate Issue Fixed!
body:
We’ve fixed the issue in the English **QWERTY** keyboard course where *Sentence Practice (Lesson 4)* in Chapter 1 was not giving all three stars.

To apply the fix, please **delete the English [QWERTY] typing course and add it again**. Don’t worry—this will **not affect any of your results, progress, or user settings**. The updated course will automatically download the corrected lessons.

Thank you for reporting and helping us improve Ustaad Typing!
